path_description: This personalized learning journey empowers Priya to build a strong foundation in digital literacy, data entry, and communication, opening doors to various digital career opportunities.

milestones.title: Foundational Digital Literacy
milestones.description: Mastering basic computer skills and navigating the digital world.
milestones.project: Create a personal email account, practice sending emails, and research a topic of interest online, summarizing findings in a document.

milestones.title: Essential Data Entry Techniques
milestones.description: Developing proficiency in accurate and efficient data entry practices.
skills: Working with spreadsheets (e.g., Google Sheets, Microsoft Excel)
milestones.project: Create a spreadsheet to track household expenses for a month, including formulas for calculations and data validation rules.

milestones.title: Effective Written Communication
milestones.description: Enhancing written communication skills for professional contexts.
milestones.project: Write a formal email requesting information about a digital skills training program and create a short presentation summarizing key takeaways from a recent online article.

milestones.title: Confident Verbal Communication
milestones.description: Building confidence in verbal communication for interviews and workplace interactions.
milestones.project: Participate in mock interviews with peers and practice delivering a short presentation on a personal achievement or skill.

milestones.title: Advanced Data Management
milestones.description: Expanding data entry skills to include database management and data analysis basics.
milestones.project: Create a simple database to manage customer information for a small business and generate basic reports using data analysis tools.

career_opportunities.title: Data Entry Operator
career_opportunities.description: Entering data into computer systems accurately and efficiently for various organizations.

career_opportunities.title: Administrative Assistant
career_opportunities.description: Providing administrative support including data entry, communication, and office management tasks.

career_opportunities.title: Virtual Assistant
career_opportunities.description: Offering remote administrative, technical, or creative assistance to clients, utilizing digital skills and communication abilities.
